name: Lumbered and Outnumbered
description:
A game where you are trying to build this lumber company but the animals in the woods attack you for chopping down the trees. Build a home for you and your workers and collect wood to sell! It did not have much of a premise, but it was fun to work on! 

This game really became more of a test of combining many different genres and really showed me on why that does not work! However, I learned a lot from this game, and I really enjoyed working on it!

HINT: FOR WORKERS TO SHOWUP TO WORK THEY NEED AN ACCEPTABLE HOUSE ON YOUR PROPERTY SO MAKE THEM ONE!

BUGS:

  • The options menu is bugged, the first time you use it it will force a low resolution. Just up the resolution to fix it, the bug only happens once when no options data is found.
